EmailTemplate.name: 12-01-20 DBNK SMB Campaign Email 4.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: [This Thursday] Defend Your SMB Marketshare from NeoBanks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Last Chance to Register! Small Business Digital Banking for the Post-COVID World Thursday, December 3 at 1 p.m. EST <[[https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/3573453883138568973?source=NCReMailDripCampaign]]>
As many FIs struggle to meet the growing demands of small businesses and gig workers, neobanks are vying to win them over.
And 2021 will be the tipping point.
Hear from Jacob Jegher of Javelin Strategy & Research, along with and Doug Brown and Erica Pilon of NCR Digital Banking, as they discuss what FIs can do to win this battle to provide the full-service digital offerings small businesses need.
Javelin will also share proprietary research on this topic. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
